title: About Me
description: I'm an environmentalist passionate about plastic recycling and sustainability initiatives. My work focuses on developing innovative solutions to reduce plastic waste and promote environmental conservation.

cards.title: Plastic Recycling
cards.description: Developing innovative methods to recycle and repurpose plastic waste into valuable products.

cards.title: Sustainability
cards.description: Promoting sustainable practices and circular economy principles to reduce environmental impact.

cards.title: Environmental Protection
cards.description: Advocating for policies and practices that protect our natural ecosystems and biodiversity.
